com.io7m.smfj.bytebuffer

Class SMFByteBufferTrianglePacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.smfj.bytebuffer.SMFByteBufferTrianglePacker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SMFParserEventsDataTrianglesType, SMFParserEventsErrorType

    public final class SMFByteBufferTrianglePacker
extends Object
implements SMFParserEventsDataTrianglesType
    An event listener that packs data into a given ByteBuffer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SMFByteBufferTrianglePacker

        public SMFByteBufferTrianglePacker(SMFParserEventsErrorType in_events,
                                   ByteBuffer in_triangle_buffer,
                                   int in_size,
                                   long in_triangles)
        Construct a packer.
        Parameters:
        in_events - A receiver of errors and warnings
        in_triangle_buffer - The byte buffer that will contain triangle data
        in_size - The size in bits of a single triangle index
        in_triangles - The number of triangles that will be packed
